designSystem.name: Organic Pet App Design System
designSystem.description: A warm, friendly, and organic design system for pet-focused mobile applications. Emphasizes soft shapes, muted natural colors, and approachable typography.

designPrinciples.overall_aesthetic: Soft, organic, and approachable with a hand-drawn, artisanal feel
designPrinciples.mood: Warm, friendly, nurturing, and playful without being childish
designPrinciples.visual_language: Rounded corners everywhere, gentle curves, minimal sharp edges
designPrinciples.illustration_style: Hand-drawn, slightly imperfect line work with organic shapes and warm color fills

colors.palette_philosophy: Muted, nature-inspired tones that feel calm and welcoming. Avoid harsh or saturated colors.

olive_green.usage: Hero sections, branded containers, primary visual anchors

lime_accent.usage: CTAs, buttons, highlight tags, interactive elements

typography.philosophy: Friendly and readable. Mix of playful display fonts with clean body text.

display.style: Rounded sans-serif or soft serif with personality
display.characteristics: Soft terminals, rounded letterforms, friendly appearance

body.characteristics: Open letterforms, comfortable reading at small sizes

spacing.philosophy: Generous whitespace creates breathing room and reduces visual clutter

borderRadius.philosophy: Heavily rounded corners are essential to the organic, friendly feel
borderRadius.usage_notes: Default to larger radius values. Cards should have very rounded corners (32px+). Buttons should be pill-shaped. Avoid sharp corners entirely.

shadows.philosophy: Subtle, soft shadows that don't compete with content. No harsh drop shadows.
shadows.usage_notes: Use sparingly. Cards often have no shadow, relying on background color contrast instead.

cards.style: Soft, rounded containers with generous padding

tags_chips.background: lime_accent for active, soft_beige for inactive

input_fields.border: 1px solid transparent or very light gray
input_fields.focus_state: subtle shadow or border color change

task_cards.layout: horizontal with tag, description, and checkbox
task_cards.background: soft gradient or solid light color

navigation.pagination_dots: small circles, filled for active, outline for inactive

style_guide.line_work: Hand-drawn appearance, slightly imperfect, organic curves
style_guide.line_weight: Medium weight, consistent but not perfectly uniform
style_guide.line_color: Dark charcoal or contextual darker shade of fill color
style_guide.fill_style: Flat colors with occasional subtle gradients
style_guide.color_palette: Use accent colors (lavender, terracotta, muted tones)
style_guide.subject_matter: Friendly animals in relaxed, playful poses
style_guide.placement: Bottom of cards, floating in white space, never cramped

character_design.proportions: Slightly stylized, cute without being cartoonish
character_design.poses: Relaxed, natural, often sitting or lounging

layout.philosophy: Clean, uncluttered layouts with clear visual hierarchy

grid.columns: Single column for mobile, generous margins

card_layouts.hero_card: Full-width, tall, centered content with illustration
card_layouts.selection_card: Full-width, question at top, options below, illustration at bottom
card_layouts.dashboard_card: Full-width, greeting at top, stacked task items

layout.content_alignment: Left-aligned text primarily, centered for hero/splash screens
layout.visual_balance: Illustrations balance text weight, create asymmetric harmony

micro_interactions.button_hover: Subtle scale up (1.02-1.05) with slight shadow increase

accessibility.color_contrast: Ensure sufficient contrast especially on lime_accent buttons

do: Use generous border radius on everything
dont: Use sharp corners or geometric shapes
Overcrowd layouts with too many elements
Use cold grays or stark whites
Use overly formal or technical typography
